Identifier.fullTitle: A DID method specification MUST further restrict the generic DID syntax by defining its own method-name and its own method-specific-id syntax.
Identifier.title: A DID method specification MUST further restrict the generic DID syntax by defining its own method-name and its own method-specific-id syntax.

Identifier.fullTitle: A method-specific parameter name MUST be prefixed by the method name as defined by the method-name rule.
Identifier.title: A method-specific parameter name MUST be prefixed by the method name as defined by the method-name rule.

Identifier.fullTitle: A generic DID path is identical to a URI path and MUST conform to the the path-abempty ABNF rule in [RFC3986].
Identifier.title: A generic DID path is identical to a URI path and MUST conform to the the path-abempty ABNF rule in [RFC3986].

Identifier.fullTitle: A generic DID query is identical to a URI query and MUST conform to the the query ABNF rule in [RFC3986].
Identifier.title: A generic DID query is identical to a URI query and MUST conform to the the query ABNF rule in [RFC3986].

Identifier.fullTitle: A generic DID fragment is identical to a URI fragment and MUST conform to the the fragment ABNF rule in [RFC3986]
Identifier.title: A generic DID fragment is identical to a URI fragment and MUST conform to the the fragment ABNF rule in [RFC3986]

Identifier.fullTitle: The did: scheme name MUST be lowercase.
Identifier.title: The did: scheme name MUST be lowercase.

Identifier.fullTitle: (did) The method name MUST be lowercase.
Identifier.title: (did) The method name MUST be lowercase.

Document.fullTitle: The value of the @context property MUST be one or more URIs, where the value of the first URI ishttps://www.w3.org/2019/did/v1.
Document.title: The value of the @context property MUST be one or more URIs, where the value of the first URI ishttps://www.w3.org/2019/did/v1.

Document.fullTitle: If more than one URI is provided, the URIs MUST be interpreted as an ordered set.
Document.title: If more than one URI is provided, the URIs MUST be interpreted as an ordered set.

Document.fullTitle: DID Documents MUST include the @context property.
Document.title: DID Documents MUST include the @context property.

Document.fullTitle: A DID Document MUST have exactly one top-level context statement.
Document.title: A DID Document MUST have exactly one top-level context statement.

Document.fullTitle: The key for this property (context) MUST be @context.
Document.title: The key for this property (context) MUST be @context.

Document.fullTitle: The value of this key MUST be at least the URL for the generic DID context: https://www.w3.org/2019/did/v1.
Document.title: The value of this key MUST be at least the URL for the generic DID context: https://www.w3.org/2019/did/v1.

Document.fullTitle: Method-specific contexts MUST NOT override the terms defined in the generic DID context.
Document.title: Method-specific contexts MUST NOT override the terms defined in the generic DID context.

Document.fullTitle: A DID Document MUST have exactly one DID subject.
Document.title: A DID Document MUST have exactly one DID subject.

Document.fullTitle: The key for this property MUST be id.
Document.title: The key for this property MUST be id.

Document.fullTitle: The value of this key MUST be a valid DID.
Document.title: The value of this key MUST be a valid DID.

Document.fullTitle: However, the fully resolved DID Document MUST contain a valid id property.
Document.title: However, the fully resolved DID Document MUST contain a valid id property.

Document.fullTitle: A DID Document that contains a revoked key MUST also contain or refer to the revocation information for the key (e.g., a revocation list).
Document.title: A DID Document that contains a revoked key MUST also contain or refer to the revocation information for the key (e.g., a revocation list).

Document.fullTitle: The value of the publicKey property MUST be an array of public keys.
Document.title: The value of the publicKey property MUST be an array of public keys.

Document.fullTitle: Each public key MUST include id and type properties, and exactly one value property. The array of public keys MUST NOT contain duplicate entries with the same id.
Document.title: Each public key MUST include id and type properties, and exactly one value property. The array of public keys MUST NOT contain duplicate entries with the same id.

Document.fullTitle: Each public key MUST include a controller property, which identifies the controller of the corresponding private key.
Document.title: Each public key MUST include a controller property, which identifies the controller of the corresponding private key.

Document.fullTitle: The value property of a public key MUST be exactly one of publicKeyPem, publicKeyJwk, publicKeyHex, publicKeyBase64, publicKeyBase58, publicKeyMultibase, depending on the format and encoding of the public key.
Document.title: The value property of a public key MUST be exactly one of publicKeyPem, publicKeyJwk, publicKeyHex, publicKeyBase64, publicKeyBase58, publicKeyMultibase, depending on the format and encoding of the public key.

Document.fullTitle: Each service endpoint MUSTmust include id, type, and serviceEndpoint properties, and MAY include additional properties.
Document.title: Each service endpoint MUSTmust include id, type, and serviceEndpoint properties, and MAY include additional properties.

Document.fullTitle: The value of the serviceEndpoint property MUST be a JSON-LD object or a valid URI conforming to [RFC3986] and normalized according to the rules in section 6 of [RFC3986] and to any normalization rules in its applicable URI scheme specification.
Document.title: The value of the serviceEndpoint property MUST be a JSON-LD object or a valid URI conforming to [RFC3986] and normalized according to the rules in section 6 of [RFC3986] and to any normalization rules in its applicable URI scheme specification.

Document.fullTitle: A DID Document MUST be a single JSON object conforming to [RFC8259].
Document.title: A DID Document MUST be a single JSON object conforming to [RFC8259].
